Karnataka.name: Bagalkot
Karnataka.description: Known for Badami caves and historical architecture.

Karnataka.name: Ballari
Karnataka.description: Rich in iron ore and home to Hampi ruins.

Karnataka.name: Belagavi
Karnataka.description: Commercial hub with scenic hills and temples.

Karnataka.name: Bengaluru Rural
Karnataka.description: Surrounding rural district of the capital city.

Karnataka.name: Bengaluru Urban
Karnataka.description: Capital city, India's Silicon Valley.

Karnataka.name: Bidar
Karnataka.description: Famous for Bidriware and historic forts.

Karnataka.name: Chamarajanagar
Karnataka.description: Known for Bandipur National Park.

Karnataka.name: Chikkaballapur
Karnataka.description: Known for Nandi Hills and silk production.

Karnataka.name: Chikkamagaluru
Karnataka.description: Coffee land of Karnataka with scenic hills.

Karnataka.name: Chitradurga
Karnataka.description: Known for historic fort and windmills.

Karnataka.name: Dakshina Kannada
Karnataka.description: Coastal district with Mangalore city.

Karnataka.name: Davanagere
Karnataka.description: Textile hub and famous for Benne Dosa.

Karnataka.name: Dharwad
Karnataka.description: Educational center merged with Hubballi city.

Karnataka.name: Gadag
Karnataka.description: Known for historic temples and inscriptions.

Karnataka.name: Hassan
Karnataka.description: Gateway to Belur and Halebidu temples.

Karnataka.name: Haveri
Karnataka.description: Known for agriculture and Byadagi chillies.

Karnataka.name: Kalaburagi
Karnataka.description: Formerly Gulbarga, known for Sufi heritage.

Karnataka.name: Kodagu
Karnataka.description: Also called Coorg, known for coffee and hills.

Karnataka.name: Kolar
Karnataka.description: Famous for gold mines and temples.

Karnataka.name: Koppal
Karnataka.description: Rich in ancient temples and historical ruins.

Karnataka.name: Mandya
Karnataka.description: Sugar city, famous for Krishna Raja Sagara dam.

Karnataka.name: Mysuru
Karnataka.description: Cultural capital of Karnataka, known for palaces.

Karnataka.name: Raichur
Karnataka.description: Historic region between Krishna and Tungabhadra rivers.

Karnataka.name: Ramanagara
Karnataka.description: Known for Sholay movie hills and silk industries.

Karnataka.name: Shivamogga
Karnataka.description: Gateway to Western Ghats, famous for Jog Falls.

Karnataka.name: Tumakuru
Karnataka.description: Industrial district and educational hub.

Karnataka.name: Udupi
Karnataka.description: Known for temples and beautiful beaches.

Karnataka.name: Uttara Kannada
Karnataka.description: Coastal district with forests and waterfalls.

Karnataka.name: Vijayapura
Karnataka.description: Famous for Gol Gumbaz and Islamic architecture.

Karnataka.name: Yadgir
Karnataka.description: Agricultural district known for paddy fields.
